sources.title: THE DAREDEVIL (1923) -- Ben Turpin
sources.description: THE DAREDEVIL (1923) [abridged] Starring: Ben Turpin, Harry Gribbon, Madeline Hurlock, John J. Richardson Directed by Del Lord Produced by Mack Sennett William Thomas Sherman, wts@gunjones.com, http://www.mn-hp.com

metadata.Plot: A woman performs a series of dangerous stunts, many of which involve precarious climbs at tremendous heights, including riding down a windmill and hanging from the landing gear of a biplane.
